name: CVE-2010-1906
description: tgsrv.exe in the Repair Service in Consona Dynamic Agent, Repair Manager, Subscriber Activation, and Subscriber Agent relies on a predictable timestamp field to validate input to the \\.\pipe\__RepairService_pipe__company named pipe, which allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by obtaining the current time from (1) tcpip.sys or (2) an SMB2 service.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_dynamic_agent:-:-:enterprise:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_dynamic_agent:-:-:marketing:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_subscriber_agent:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_subscriber_activation:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_dynamic_agent:-:-:support:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:consona:consona_repair_manager:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
